thread.title: Hrithik Roshan keen on investing in biz ventures such as startups
thread.title_full: Hrithik Roshan keen on investing in biz ventures such as startups - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Hrithik Roshan keen on investing in biz ventures such as startups
text:
Close on the heels of launching his own casual wear brand HRx, Bollywood actor Hrithik Roshan today expressed his willingness to invest in technologies such as startups, but is awaiting a concept to take shape which will provide opportunities for people to grow.*Hrithik Roshan
*
"Why not? I am very proactive in my mind about ... Â»
